testcase.classname: Verify Scroll Up without 'Arrow' button and Scroll Down functionality
testcase.name: Case 23 Verify address details in checkout page
testcase.system-out: Given User goes to "autoUrl" website........................................passed Then Verify that home page is visible successfully..........................passed Then Click Signup Login button..............................................passed And Fill all details in Signup and create account...........................passed And Verify ACCOUNT CREATED! and click Continue button.......................passed And Verify Logged in as username at top.....................................passed And Add products to cart....................................................passed And Click Cart button.......................................................passed And Verify that cart page is displayed......................................passed And Click Proceed To Checkout...............................................passed And Verify that the delivery address is same address filled at the time registration of account.passed And Verify that the billing address is same address filled at the time registration of account.passed And Click Delete Account button.............................................passed And Verify ACCOUNT DELETED! and click Continue button.......................passed And Closes the page.........................................................passed
